revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Intel |model=AnyPoint Gateway |revision=DSL (Model 4400) |asin= |manuf_country=Malaysia |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/28/2002 |fcc_id=EJM-X400 |pcb_id= |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gemtek WL-350F |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3874 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=intel-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^intel-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:07:E9 |oui_eth=00:07:E9 }} {{TagLine|Intel AnyPoint DSL Gateway}} The EJM-X400 FCC ID covers both the model 4400 (DSL Gateway) :and the 1400 (Wireless Router).
It looks like there is some degree of ''[[Intel]]'' silicon within this device..
